Preparing the data
================================

The following objects should help you prepare the data to then get VEnCodes.

Note that this step is not essential, depending on your starting data. Nonetheless, the objects listed here
provide easy methods to prep your data and work well with the objects in the next section.

Objects for general data
________________________

.. automodule:: VEnCode.internals
    :members: DataTpm


Objects for FANTOM5 data
________________________

.. automodule:: VEnCode.internals
    :members: DataTpmFantom5
